content:
API Documentation url:
https://developers.pinterest.com/docs/api/v5/introduction/?

Connect Pinterest integrations
Connect Pinterest with any of your favorite apps in just a few clicks. Design, build, and automate anything for your work by integrating apps like Pinterest to create visual automated workflows. Choose from thousands of ready-made apps or use our no-code toolkit to connect to apps not yet in our library.

Action
Create a Board
Creates a board.

Action
Create a Pin
Creates a new pin.

Action
Delete a Board
Deletes a specific board.

Action
Delete a Pin
Deletes the selected pin.

Action
Get a Board
Retrieves information about a specific board.

Action
Get a Pin
Returns information about a pin.

Action
Make an API Call
Performs an arbitrary authorized API call.

Action
Update a Board
Updates a specific board.
Please provide me with information about a service, its most common use cases, and a list of its API actions.

actions and triggers for the pinterest service. I want to create Appmixer connector to utilize most common actions on the pinterest API, include a documentation link for each component, endpoint URL, HTTP method - GET, POST, PUT, PATCH. Provide API base URL, provide list of inputs for each component.
Create the service json as well, (serviceJson property)
ignore input parameters for pagination, it could be for example page, offset, limit, etc.

Action naming conventions: Try to avoid naming with "List", such as "List Users", "List Contacts" etc. Use "Find" instead. For example "Find Users", "FInd Contacts". These actions have usually input parameters for search, such as "query", "search" or similar.

Provide information about authentication, include type of authentication, and other properties. Provide information about authentication endpoint URL, token URL for managing access token - for obtaining access token and refreshing access token. Provide information about profile info URL, where is possible to get information about current user. It is used for getting user profile information, such as email, name, etc. (authentication property)
